name: stage
description: lightweight canvas wrapper for micro animations

scripts.build: npm run clean; browserify  -t babelify -e src/stage.js > build/stage.js; browserify -t babelify -g uglifyify -e src/stage.js > build/stage.min.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t babelify -e src/stage.js -o build/stage.js && watchify -t babelify -g uglifyify -e src/stage.js -o build/stage.min.js
scripts.dev: npm run open -s & npm run build -s & parallelshell 'npm run serve -s' 'npm run watch -s'

author: Henner Woehler <info@henner-woehler.de> (http://www.henner-woehler.de)
